con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://hospital.hms.com/service" name="InfrastuctureService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://hospital.hms.com/service"> <wsdl:documentation>Definition for a SOAP web service for hospital hms</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://hospital.hms.com/service" schemaLocation="Hospital.xsd"/> <!--Department data--> <xsd:element name="getDepartment"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="departmentId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getDepartmentResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="department" type="tns:Department"/> <!--Add other elements as needed--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--A wsdl message element is used to define a message exchanged between a web service--> <wsdl:message name="getDepartment"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="getDepartment"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getDepartmentResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="getDepartmentResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--A wsdl port type is used to combine multiple messages(input, output) into a single operation--> <wsdl:portType name="InfrastucturePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="getDepartment"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getDepartment"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getDepartmentResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--A binding element defines exactly how each operation will take place over the network--> <wsdl:binding name="InfrastuctureBinding" type="tns:InfrastucturePortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getDepartment"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://hospital.example.com/getDepartment"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--A service element finally says where the service can be access from, the endpoint--> <wsdl:service name="InfrastuctureService"> <wsdl:port name="InfrastucturePort" binding="tns:InfrastuctureBinding"> <soap:address location="http://hospital.example.com/api/soap/infrastucture-service"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://hospital.hms.com/service" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://hospital.hms.com/service"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace"/> <xs:element name="hospital" type="Hospital"/> <xs:complexType name="Hospital"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="infrastructure" type="Infrastructure"/> <xs:element name="staff" type="Staff"/> <xs:element name="patients" type="Patients"/> <xs:element name="history" type="History"/> <xs:element name="reception" type="Reception"/> <xs:element name="accounting" type="Accounting"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Infrastructure"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="department" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Department"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Infrastructure" type="Infrastructure"/> <xs:complexType name="Department"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="departmentId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="departmentName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="departmentDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="headOfDepartmentId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="blockId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="room" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Room" minOccurs="0"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Room"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="roomId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="bed" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Bed"/> <xs:element name="roomSize"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <xs:enumeration value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="5"/> <xs:enumeration value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Room" type="Room"/> <xs:complexType name="Bed"> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element name="bedId" type="xs:ID"></xs:element> <xs:element name="bedSize"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Staff"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="doctor" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Doctor"/> <xs:element name="nurse" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Nurse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Doctor"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="doctorId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="doctorName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="speciality" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="relantionship" type="Relantionship"/> <xs:element name="doctorContact" type="Contact"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="Relantionship"> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Trainee"/> <xs:enumeration value="Visiting"/> <xs:enumeration value="Permanent"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="Nurse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="nurseId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="nurseName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="nurseContact" type="Contact"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Contact"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="phone" type="Phone"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Patients"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patient" type="Patient" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--FIXME--> <xs:complexType name="Patient"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="patientName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="sex" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="weight" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="age" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="attendedDept" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="attendedDoctor" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="bedTo" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="dateAdmitted" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="dateDischarged" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="patientAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="patientPhone" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <!--FIXME--> <xs:element name="Patient" type="Patient"/> <xs:simpleType name="Sex"> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Female"/> <xs:enumeration value="Male"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="RecoveryPeriod"> <xs:attribute name="dateAdmitted" type="xs:date"/> <xs:attribute name="dateDischarged" type="xs:date"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="History"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="record" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Record"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Record"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="patientState" type="PatientState"/> <xs:element name="historyUpdate" type="HistoryUpdate" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="PatientState"> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Sick"/> <xs:enumeration value="Diseased"/> <xs:enumeration value="Severe"/> <xs:enumeration value="Good"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Phone"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="\(\d{3}\)\s\d{3}-\d{4}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="HistoryUpdate"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="historyId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="updateDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="updateTime" type="xs:time"/> <xs:element name="departmentId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="medicalCase" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="doctorId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="doctorComments" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="prescription" type="Prescription"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Prescription"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="pills" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Pill"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Pill"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="pillName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="instructions" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Reception"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="appointment" type="Appointment" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Reception" type="Reception"/> <xs:complexType name="Appointment"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="doctorId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="appointedDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="appointedTime" type="xs:time"/> <xs:element name="comments" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Accounting"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="expenditures" type="Expenditures"/> <xs:element name="incomes" type="Incomes"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Accounting" type="Accounting"/> <xs:complexType name="Expenditures"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="salaries" type="Salaries"/> <xs:element name="miscellaneousOrders" type="MiscellaneousOrders"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Salaries"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="Salary" type="Salary" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Salary"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="paymentId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="staffId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="payment" type="Amount"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="MiscellaneousOrders"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order" maxOccurs="unbounded" type="Order"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="MiscellaneousOrders" type="MiscellaneousOrders"/> <xs:complexType name="Order"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="orderId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="orderDate" type="xs:date"/> <xs:element name="cost" type="Amount"/> <xs:element name="departmentId" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount"> <xs:restriction base="xs:double"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="Incomes"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="patientBill" type="PatientBill" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PatientBill"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="billId" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="billCost" type="Amount"/> <xs:element name="patientId" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema>

<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://hospital.hms.com/service" name="PatientsService" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://hospital.hms.com/service"> <wsdl:documentation>Definition for a SOAP web service for hospital hms</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xsd:import namespace="http://hospital.hms.com/service" schemaLocation="Hospital.xsd"/> <!--Patient data--> <xsd:element name="getPatient"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="patientId" type="xsd:int"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="getPatientResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="patient" type="tns:PatientType"/> <!--Add other elements as needed--> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--A wsdl message element is used to define a message exchanged between a web service--> <wsdl:message name="getPatient"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="getPatient"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="getPatientResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="getPatientResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <!--A wsdl port type is used to combine multiple messages(input, output) into a single operation--> <wsdl:portType name="PatientsPortType"> <wsdl:operation name="getPatient"> <wsdl:input message="tns:getPatient"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:getPatientResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--A binding element defines exactly how each operation will take place over the network--> <wsdl:binding name="PatientsBinding" type="tns:PatientsPortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="getPatient"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://hospital.example.com/getPatient"/> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <!--A service element finally says where the service can be accesd from, the endpoint--> <wsdl:service name="PatientsService"> <wsdl:port name="PatientsPort" binding="tns:PatientsBinding"> <soap:address location="http://hospital.example.com/api/soap/patients-service"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="http://hospital.hms.com/service" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://hospital.hms.com/service"> <xs:import namespace="http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace"/> <xs:complexType name="HospitalType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Infrastructure"/> <xs:element ref="Staff"/> <xs:element ref="Patients"/> <xs:element ref="History"/> <xs:element ref="Reception"/> <xs:element ref="Accounting"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Hospital" type="HospitalType"/> <xs:complexType name="InfrastructureType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Wings" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Infrastructure" type="InfrastructureType"/> <xs:complexType name="WingsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Wing" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Wings" type="WingsType"/> <xs:complexType name="WingType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Departments" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> <xs:element ref="Wards" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="wingID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Wing[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Wing" type="WingType"/> <xs:complexType name="DepartmentsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Department" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Departments" type="DepartmentsType"/> <xs:complexType name="DepartmentType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="DeptartID" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="DepartmentName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="DepartmentDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="HODID" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="BlockID" type="xs:ID"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Department" type="DepartmentType"/> <xs:complexType name="WardsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Ward" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Wards" type="WardsType"/> <xs:complexType name="WardType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Rooms" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="WardID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Wing[0-9]+Ward[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Ward" type="WardType"/> <xs:complexType name="RoomsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Room" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Rooms" type="RoomsType"/> <xs:complexType name="RoomType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Beds" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="RoomID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Wing[0-9]+Ward[0-9]+Room[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="RoomSize" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> <xs:enumeration value="3"/> <xs:enumeration value="4"/> <xs:enumeration value="5"/> <xs:enumeration value="6"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Room" type="RoomType"/> <xs:complexType name="BedsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Bed" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Beds" type="BedsType"/> <xs:complexType name="BedType"> <xs:attribute name="BedID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Wing[0-9]+Ward[0-9]+Room[0-9]+Bed[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="BedSize" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="1"/> <xs:enumeration value="2"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Bed" type="BedType"/> <xs:complexType name="StaffType"> <xs:sequence maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xs:element ref="Doctors"/> <xs:element ref="Nurses"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Staff" type="StaffType"/> <xs:complexType name="DoctorsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Doctor" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Doctors" type="DoctorsType"/> <xs:complexType name="DoctorType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="DoctorName"/> <xs:element ref="Speciality"/> <xs:element ref="Relantionship"/> <xs:element ref="DoctorContact"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="DoctorID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Doctor[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="WorksIn" type="xs:IDREF" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="HeadOfDept" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Doctor" type="DoctorType"/> <xs:element name="DoctorName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Speciality" type="xs:string"/> <xs:complexType name="RelantionshipT"> <xs:attribute name="RelantionshipType" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Trainee"/> <xs:enumeration value="Visiting"/> <xs:enumeration value="Permanent"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Relantionship" type="RelantionshipT"/> <xs:complexType name="DoctorContactType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="DoctorAddress"/> <xs:element ref="DoctorPhone" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="DoctorContact" type="DoctorContactType"/> <xs:element name="DoctorAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="DoctorPhone" type="xs:string"/> <xs:complexType name="NursesType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Nurse" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Nurses" type="NursesType"/> <xs:complexType name="NurseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="NurseName"/> <xs:element ref="NurseContact"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="NurseID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Nurse[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="WorksIn" type="xs:IDREF" use="required"/> <xs:attribute name="InspectWard" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Nurse" type="NurseType"/> <xs:element name="NurseName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:complexType name="NurseContactType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="NurseAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="NursePhone" type="xs:string" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="NurseContact" type="NurseContactType"/> <xs:complexType name="PatientsType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="Patient" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Patients" type="PatientsType"/> <xs:complexType name="PatientType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PatientName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Sex" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Weight" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="Age" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="AttendedDept" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="AttendedDoctor" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element name="BedTo" type="xs:ID"/> <xs:element ref="RecoveryPeriod"/> <xs:element ref="PatientContact"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="PatientID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Patient[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="PatientType" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="OutPatient"/> <xs:enumeration value="InPatient"/> <xs:enumeration value="VisitPatient"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Patient" type="PatientType"/> <xs:element name="PatientName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:complexType name="SexType"> <xs:attribute name="GenderGategory" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Female"/> <xs:enumeration value="Male"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Sex" type="SexType"/> <xs:complexType name="WeightType"> <xs:attribute name="PatientWeight" type="xs:string"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Weight" type="WeightType"/> <xs:complexType name="AgeType"> <xs:attribute name="PatientAge" type="xs:int"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Age" type="AgeType"/> <xs:complexType name="AttendedDeptType"> <xs:attribute name="AttendedIn" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="AttendedDept" type="AttendedDeptType"/> <xs:complexType name="AttendedDoctorType"> <xs:attribute name="AttendedBy" type="xs:IDREFS"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="AttendedDoctor" type="AttendedDoctorType"/> <xs:complexType name="BedToType"> <xs:attribute name="assignedBed" type="xs:IDREF"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="BedTo" type="BedToType"/> <xs:complexType name="RecoveryPeriodType"> <xs:attribute name="dateAdmitted" type="xs:date"/> <xs:attribute name="dateDischarged" type="xs:date"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="RecoveryPeriod" type="RecoveryPeriodType"/> <xs:complexType name="PatientContactType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="PatientAddress" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="PatientPhone" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="PatientContact" type="PatientContactType"/> <xs:complexType name="HistoryType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Record" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="History" type="HistoryType"/> <xs:complexType name="RecordType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="AffiliatedPatient"/> <xs:element ref="PatientState"/> <xs:element ref="HistoryUpdate" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="HistoryRecID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Record[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Record" type="RecordType"/> <xs:complexType name="AffiliatedPatientType"> <xs:attribute name="AffiliatedPatientID" type="xs:IDREF" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="AffiliatedPatient" type="AffiliatedPatientType"/> <xs:complexType name="PatientStateType"> <xs:attribute name="Pstate" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:NMTOKEN"> <xs:enumeration value="Sick"/> <xs:enumeration value="Diseased"/> <xs:enumeration value="Severe"/> <xs:enumeration value="Good"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="PatientState" type="PatientStateType"/> <xs:complexType name="HistoryUpdateType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:sequence> <xs:element ref="UpdateDate"/> <xs:element ref="UpdateTime"/> <xs:element ref="AffiliatedDoctor"/> <xs:element ref="AffiliatedDepart"/> <xs:element ref="MedicalCase"/> <xs:element ref="DoctorComments"/> <xs:element ref="Prescription"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="HistoryUpdateID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="HistoryUpdate[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="HistoryUpdate" type="HistoryUpdateType"/> <xs:complexType name="UpdateDateType"> <xs:attribute name="UptDate" type="xs:date" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="UpdateDate" type="UpdateDateType"/> <xs:complexType name="UpdateTimeType"> <xs:attribute name="UptTime" </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Salaries" type="SalariesType"/> <xs:complexType name="SalaryType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Payment"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> <xs:attribute name="SalaryID" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:ID"> <xs:pattern value="Salary[0-9]+"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> <xs:attribute name="staffID" type="xs:IDREF" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Salary" type="SalaryType"/> <xs:complexType name="PaymentType"> <xs:attribute name="amount" use="required"> <xs:simpleType> </xs:attribute> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="Payment" type="PaymentType"/> <xs:complexType name="MiscellaneousOrdersType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element ref="Order" use="required"/> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="PatientBill" type="PatientBillType"/> <xs:complexType name="BillCostType"> <xs:attribute name="amount" type="xs:double" use="required"/>
